data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea obovata (Sibirean spruce) from sample NOJAPCOB-272

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Podzolierte Braunerde, Tree line -68 m, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 65%, Shrub cover 30%, Herb cover 70%, Moss cover 95%, Vegatation type: Arven-Lärchen-Wald, Film number: 1122A
